originalText.text:
EXTREMELY UNPROFESSIONAL/UNRESPONSIVE. I don’t want to say their prejudice against certain races, but can’t help but feel this way.

I over qualify for a majority of the units they have available and still haven’t been approved. Been looking for about a month now. If you’re Black or Brown, I would definitely go with a different broker.

originalText.text: Please do not waste your time with this real estate agency. They send you to a place for viewing with access through an app. But the apartment is not equip with cylinder lock. I ended up not able to enter the house. Agent is not responsive at all. Then agent emailed me 6 hours later said the apt is in contract. Waste of my time, leaving review here so you don't have to waste your time with them.

originalText.text: GoodLuck trying to see an apartment through MAPT. They are unresponsive, confused and unprofessional. You’ll be waiting to get into a building even though it’s a self tour. Not worth your time!!

originalText.text:
it would be a complete waste of time, I definitely do not recommend it for you, they are never professional, the stupid crowd of people is useless, they do not give the necessary answers to your questions where necessary
This group of incompetent people who call themselves relators, brokers will demand a broker fee from you, save your time and money to yourself.
